top.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks, as hundreds killed in protests
top.summary: President Trump said on Sunday that the US military was considering "very strong options" in Iran.

top.title: Trump tells Cuba to 'make a deal, before it is too late'
top.summary: Trump has been turning his attention to Cuba since US forces seized Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.

top.title: Thousands march and dozens arrested in Minneapolis protests against ICE
top.summary: Days after the death of Renee Good, protests continue in Minneapolis and cities across the US.

top.title: Malaysia and Indonesia block Musk's Grok over sexually explicit deepfakes
top.summary: Sexualised images of real people generated by Grok have circulated on X in recent weeks.

top.title: Google employee made redundant after reporting manager who showed nude of wife, court hears
top.summary: Victoria Woodall claims she was retaliated against after reporting a manager who told clients stories about his swinger lifestyle.

top.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says
top.summary: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.
